sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-main class="main">
        <el-table :data="state.tableData" stripe style="width: 100%">
            <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="50" />
            <el-table-column prop="username" label="姓名" width="150" />
            <el-table-column prop="password" label="密码" />
            <el-table-column prop="email" label="邮箱" />
            <el-table-column prop="signature" label="签名" width="300" />
            <el-table-column prop="roleId" label="权限 " />
            <el-table-column prop="createTime" label="创建时间" :formatter="dateFormat" />
            <el-table-column prop="updateTime" label="修改时间" :formatter="dateFormat" />
            <el-table-column label="操作">
                <el-button key type="success" text bg>
                    编辑
                </el-button>
                <el-button key type="danger" text bg>
                    删除
                </el-button>
            </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
        <el-pagination v-model:current-page="currentPage" v-model:page-size="pageSize"
            :page-sizes="[100, 200, 300, 400]" layout="total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper" :total="400"
            @size-change="handleSizeChange" @current-change="handleCurrentChange" style="margin-top: 10px;" />
    </el-main>
</template>
<script>
import axios from 'axios';
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus';
import moment from 'moment';
import { reactive, ref } from 'vue';

export default {
    setup() {
        let state = reactive({
            tableData: []
        });
        const currentPage = ref(4);
        const pageSize = ref(100);
        function dateFormat(row, column) {
            var date = row[column.property];
            if (date == undefined) {
                return "";
            }
            return moment(date).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss');
        }
        function handleSizeChange(val) {
            console.log(`${val} items per page`)
        }
        function handleCurrentChange(val) {
            console.log(`current page: ${val}`)
        }

        return {
            state,
            dateFormat,
            currentPage,
            pageSize,
            handleSizeChange,
            handleCurrentChange
        }
    },
    beforeCreate() {
        axios.get("/url/user", { "currentPage": this.currentPage.value, "pageSize": this.pageSize.value }).then(res => res.data).then(res => res.data)
            .then(data => {
                console.log(data);
                this.state.tableData = data;
                // console.log(this.tableData);
            })
            .catch(err => {
                ElMessage.error("用户列表获取失败");
            })
    }
}
</script>

<style s>
.main {
    background-color: #EEE
}

.mainBody {
    background-color: white;
    width: 70%;
    height: 100%;
    margin: 0 auto;
    position: relative;
}

.myBody {
    position: absolute;
    left: 10%;
    top: 10%;
    width: 80%;
    height: 90%;
}

.name {
    width: -100px;
    text-align: center;
    margin-top: 20px;
}

.gexing {
    font-family: STXingkai, '华正行楷';
}
</style>
